title: male_recess
text-to-audio: Attention: It is now recess time for male students. Please proceed to your designated areas.

title: female_recess
text-to-audio: Attention: It is now recess time for female students. Please proceed to your designated areas.

title: zuhr_prayer
text-to-audio: Attention: It is now time for Zuhr prayer. Please prepare and proceed to the prayer area.

title: end_session
text-to-audio: Good evening. Today's lessons have concluded. Thank you for your attention and participation. Have a wonderful rest of your day
